short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By Roderick Qiu. Some of the gradients were from uiGradients.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's a minimalist chrome newtab extension.
I’ve tried dozens of those newtab plugins - But none of them are good enough and simple enough.
So I made this for me, and for everyone.
It’s worth trying it!
